targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    $__timeInterval(TimeUnix) as time,
    Attributes['workflow_name'] as workflow_name,
    sum(Value) as value
FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE MetricName = 'rivet_gasoline_workflow_active'
    AND $__conditionalAll(Attributes['workflow_name'], $workflow_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(ResourceAttributes['datacenter_id'], $datacenter_id)
    AND $__conditionalAll(ResourceAttributes['cluster_id'], $cluster_id)
    AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix)
GROUP BY time, workflow_name
ORDER BY time

SELECT
    $__timeInterval(TimeUnix) as time,
    Attributes['workflow_name'] as workflow_name,
    max(Value) as value
FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE MetricName = 'rivet_gasoline_workflow_sleeping'
  AND $__conditionalAll(Attributes['workflow_name'], $workflow_name)
  AND $__conditionalAll(ResourceAttributes['datacenter_id'], $datacenter_id)
  AND $__conditionalAll(ResourceAttributes['cluster_id'], $cluster_id)
  AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix)
GROUP BY time, workflow_name
ORDER BY time

SELECT
    $__timeInterval(TimeUnix) as time,
    Attributes['workflow_name'] as workflow_name,
    sum(Value) as value
FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE MetricName = 'rivet_gasoline_workflow_dead'
    AND $__conditionalAll(Attributes['workflow_name'], $workflow_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(ResourceAttributes['datacenter_id'], $datacenter_id)
    AND $__conditionalAll(ResourceAttributes['cluster_id'], $cluster_id)
    AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix)
GROUP BY time, workflow_name
ORDER BY time

SELECT
    $__timeInterval(TimeUnix) as time,
    Attributes['workflow_name'] as workflow_name,
    Attributes['error_code'] as error_code,
    sum(Value) as value
FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE MetricName = 'rivet_gasoline_workflow_dead'
    AND $__conditionalAll(Attributes['workflow_name'], $workflow_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(ResourceAttributes['datacenter_id'], $datacenter_id)
    AND $__conditionalAll(ResourceAttributes['cluster_id'], $cluster_id)
    AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix)
GROUP BY time, workflow_name, error_code
ORDER BY time

SELECT
    $__timeInterval(TimeUnix) as time,
    ResourceAttributes['datacenter_id'] as datacenter_id,
    count(*) as value
FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE MetricName = 'rivet_gasoline_worker_last_ping'
    AND $__conditionalAll(Attributes['workflow_name'], $workflow_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(ResourceAttributes['datacenter_id'], $datacenter_id)
    AND $__conditionalAll(ResourceAttributes['cluster_id'], $cluster_id)
    AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix)
GROUP BY time, datacenter_id
ORDER BY time

SELECT
    $__timeInterval(TimeUnix) as time,
    Attributes['signal_name'] as signal_name,
    sum(Value) as value
FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE MetricName = 'rivet_gasoline_signal_pending'
    AND $__conditionalAll(Attributes['workflow_name'], $workflow_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(ResourceAttributes['datacenter_id'], $datacenter_id)
    AND $__conditionalAll(ResourceAttributes['cluster_id'], $cluster_id)
    AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix)
GROUP BY time, signal_name
ORDER BY time

WITH
    $__timeInterval(TimeUnix) as time_bucket,
    arrayJoin(arrayEnumerate(BucketCounts)) AS idx,
    ExplicitBounds AS bounds
SELECT
    time_bucket as Time,
    bounds[idx+1] AS le,
    sum(BucketCounts[idx]) AS count
FROM otel.otel_metrics_histogram
WHERE
    MetricName = 'rivet_gasoline_signal_recv_lag'
    AND $__conditionalAll(Attributes['workflow_name'], $workflow_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(ResourceAttributes['datacenter_id'], $datacenter_id)
    AND $__conditionalAll(ResourceAttributes['cluster_id'], $cluster_id)
    AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix)
GROUP BY Time, le
ORDER BY Time, le

WITH
  $__timeInterval(TimeUnix) as time_bucket,
    arrayJoin(arrayEnumerate(BucketCounts)) AS idx,
    ExplicitBounds AS bounds
SELECT
    time_bucket as Time,
    bounds[idx+1] AS le,
    sum(BucketCounts[idx]) AS count
FROM otel.otel_metrics_histogram
WHERE
  MetricName = 'rivet_gasoline_signal_pull_duration'
  AND $__conditionalAll(Attributes['workflow_name'], $workflow_name)
  AND $__conditionalAll(ResourceAttributes['datacenter_id'], $datacenter_id)
  AND $__conditionalAll(ResourceAttributes['cluster_id'], $cluster_id)
  AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix)
GROUP BY
  Time, le
ORDER BY
  Time, le

SELECT
    $__timeInterval(TimeUnix) as time,
    Attributes['worker_instance_id'] as worker_instance_id,
    max(Value) as value
FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE MetricName = 'rivet_gasoline_last_pull_workflows_duration'
    AND ResourceAttributes['cluster_id'] LIKE '${cluster_id:regex}'
    AND ResourceAttributes['datacenter_id'] LIKE '${datacenter_id:regex}'
    AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix)
GROUP BY time, worker_instance_id
ORDER BY time

SELECT
    $__timeInterval(TimeUnix) as time,
    Attributes['worker_instance_id'] as worker_instance_id,
    max(Value) as value
FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE MetricName = 'rivet_gasoline_last_pull_workflows_history_duration'
    AND ResourceAttributes['cluster_id'] LIKE '${cluster_id:regex}'
    AND ResourceAttributes['datacenter_id'] LIKE '${datacenter_id:regex}'
    AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix)
GROUP BY time, worker_instance_id
ORDER BY time

WITH
    $__timeInterval(TimeUnix) as time_bucket,
    arrayJoin(arrayEnumerate(BucketCounts)) AS idx,
    ExplicitBounds AS bounds
SELECT
    time_bucket as Time,
    bounds[idx+1] AS le,
    sum(BucketCounts[idx]) AS count
FROM otel.otel_metrics_histogram
WHERE
    MetricName = 'rivet_gasoline_pull_workflows_duration'
    AND $__conditionalAll(Attributes['workflow_name'], $workflow_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(ResourceAttributes['datacenter_id'], $datacenter_id)
    AND $__conditionalAll(ResourceAttributes['cluster_id'], $cluster_id)
    AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix)
GROUP BY Time, le
ORDER BY Time, le

WITH
    $__timeInterval(TimeUnix) as time_bucket,
    arrayJoin(arrayEnumerate(BucketCounts)) AS idx,
    ExplicitBounds AS bounds
SELECT
    time_bucket as Time,
    bounds[idx+1] AS le,
    sum(BucketCounts[idx]) AS count
FROM otel.otel_metrics_histogram
WHERE
    MetricName = 'rivet_gasoline_pull_workflows_history_duration'
    AND $__conditionalAll(Attributes['workflow_name'], $workflow_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(ResourceAttributes['datacenter_id'], $datacenter_id)
    AND $__conditionalAll(ResourceAttributes['cluster_id'], $cluster_id)
    AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix)
GROUP BY Time, le
ORDER BY Time, le

WITH
    $__timeInterval(TimeUnix) as time_bucket,
    arrayJoin(arrayEnumerate(BucketCounts)) AS idx,
    ExplicitBounds AS bounds
SELECT
    time_bucket as Time,
    bounds[idx+1] AS le,
    sum(BucketCounts[idx]) AS count
FROM otel.otel_metrics_histogram
WHERE
    MetricName = 'rivet_gasoline_activity_duration'
    AND $__conditionalAll(Attributes['workflow_name'], $workflow_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(ResourceAttributes['datacenter_id'], $datacenter_id)
    AND $__conditionalAll(ResourceAttributes['cluster_id'], $cluster_id)
    AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix)
GROUP BY Time, le
ORDER BY Time, le

SELECT
    $__timeInterval(TimeUnix) as time,
    Attributes['activity_name'] as activity_name,
    Attributes['error_code'] as error_code,
    sum(Value) / $__interval_ms * 1000 as value
FROM otel.otel_metrics_sum
WHERE MetricName = 'rivet_gasoline_activity_errors'
    AND $__conditionalAll(Attributes['workflow_name'], $workflow_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(ResourceAttributes['datacenter_id'], $datacenter_id)
    AND $__conditionalAll(ResourceAttributes['cluster_id'], $cluster_id)
    AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix)
GROUP BY time, activity_name, error_code
ORDER BY time

WITH
  $__timeInterval(TimeUnix) as time_bucket,
    arrayJoin(arrayEnumerate(BucketCounts)) AS idx,
    ExplicitBounds AS bounds
SELECT
    time_bucket as Time,
    bounds[idx+1] AS le,
    sum(BucketCounts[idx]) AS count
FROM otel.otel_metrics_histogram
WHERE
    MetricName = 'rivet_gasoline_loop_iteration_duration'
    AND $__conditionalAll(Attributes['workflow_name'], $workflow_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(ResourceAttributes['datacenter_id'], $datacenter_id)
    AND $__conditionalAll(ResourceAttributes['cluster_id'], $cluster_id)
    AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix)
GROUP BY Time, le
ORDER BY Time, le

SELECT
    $__timeInterval(TimeUnix) as time,
    Attributes['workflow_name'] as workflow_name,
    sum(Count) / $__interval_ms * 1000 as value
FROM otel.otel_metrics_histogram
WHERE MetricName = 'rivet_gasoline_loop_iteration_duration'
    AND Attributes['workflow_name'] LIKE '${workflow_name:regex}'
    AND ResourceAttributes['cluster_id'] LIKE '${cluster_id:regex}'
    AND ResourceAttributes['datacenter_id'] LIKE '${datacenter_id:regex}'
    AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix)
GROUP BY time, workflow_name
ORDER BY time

WITH
    $__timeInterval(TimeUnix) as time_bucket,
    arrayJoin(arrayEnumerate(BucketCounts)) AS idx,
    ExplicitBounds AS bounds
SELECT
    time_bucket as Time,
    bounds[idx+1] AS le,

FROM otel.otel_metrics_histogram
WHERE

    AND $__conditionalAll(Attributes['workflow_name'], $workflow_name)

    AND $__conditionalAll(ResourceAttributes['cluster_id'], $cluster_id)

GROUP BY Time, le
ORDER BY Time, le

WITH
    $__timeInterval(TimeUnix) as time_bucket,

SELECT

FROM otel.otel_metrics_histogram

GROUP BY Time, le
ORDER BY Time, le

    arrayJoin(arrayEnumerate(BucketCounts)) AS idx,
    ExplicitBounds AS bounds
SELECT
    time_bucket as Time,
    bounds[idx+1] AS le,
    sum(BucketCounts[idx]) AS count
FROM otel.otel_metrics_histogram
WHERE

    AND $__conditionalAll(Attributes['workflow_name'], $workflow_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(ResourceAttributes['datacenter_id'], $datacenter_id)
    AND $__conditionalAll(ResourceAttributes['cluster_id'], $cluster_id)

GROUP BY Time, le

WITH

    arrayJoin(arrayEnumerate(BucketCounts)) AS idx,

SELECT
    time_bucket as Time,

FROM otel.otel_metrics_histogram
WHERE
    MetricName = 'rivet_gasoline_workflow_dispatch_duration'
    AND $__conditionalAll(Attributes['workflow_name'], $workflow_name)

    AND $__conditionalAll(ResourceAttributes['cluster_id'], $cluster_id)
    AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix)
GROUP BY Time, le
ORDER BY Time, le

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT ResourceAttributes['cluster_id'] as cluster_id FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE MetricName = 'rivet_gasoline_worker_last_ping' ORDER BY cluster_id
list.label: Cluster ID
list.name: cluster_id

query.rawSql: SELECT DISTINCT ResourceAttributes['cluster_id'] as cluster_id FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE MetricName = 'rivet_gasoline_worker_last_ping' ORDER BY cluster_id
